page.title: 02CONSTABLE BURTON-MILL LANE
page.content:
{Constable Burton}lies on the main A684 road.Most of the houses in the village are on the side roads.
One of these roads,leading to the old ford across Constable Burton beck is called{Mill Lane.}The mill,after which the lane is named,is no longer used, but parts of the works are still there,including most of the wheel.
10 council houses have been built along Mill Lane as well as some garages and a bungalow.The{Methodist {Chapel}is opposite the old mill entrance and is still in use.Further on up the road leading to Finghall is a small group of houses for older people called Donald Smith Close.
